metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4460 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The serializing/deserializing functions in the qpid::framing::Buffer class in Apache Qpid 0.20 and earlier allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and daemon exit) via unspecified vectors. NOTE: this issue could also trigger an out-of-bounds read, but it might not trigger a crash.

criterions.comment: qpid-cpp package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
